Class GibberishWriter

java.lang.Object
  GibberishWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Iterable
public class GibberishWriter
extends Object
implements Iterable

A Class that takes text as input and outputs gibberish of the same style as the input

Author:
James Talbott

Nested Class Summary
 class GibberishWriter.Context
          Class represents a context, or a group of a set number of words
 class GibberishWriter.ContextData
          Class stores data relating to a Context
 class GibberishWriter.GibberishIterator
          Inner class functions as an iterator
 class GibberishWriter.WordData
          Class stores a word and the number of times it occurs
 
Constructor Summary
GibberishWriter(int contextSize, Scanner scanner)
          Contructor analyzes the input string and populates linked lists of ContextData and WordData
 
Method Summary
 boolean hasNext()
           
 Iterator iterator()
          Method overrides method stub in interface Iterable
static void main(String[] args)
          Main method creates a Scanner using a given filename, uses it to create a GibberishWriter object, and calls GibberishWriter's next method a given number of times to produce gibberish.
 String next(int contextSize)
          Method uses the current Context and an implementation of a Markov chain to return a word

Constructor Detail

GibberishWriter

public GibberishWriter(int contextSize,
                       Scanner scanner)
Contructor analyzes the input string and populates linked lists of ContextData and WordData

Parameters:
contextSize - The number of words per context
scanner - The scanner used to read the input text
Method Detail

hasNext

public boolean hasNext()
Returns:
true

next

public String next(int contextSize)
Method uses the current Context and an implementation of a Markov chain to return a word

Parameters:
contextSize - The number of words in a Context
Returns:
a word based on the current Context

iterator

public Iterator iterator()
Method overrides method stub in interface Iterable

Specified by:
iterator in interface Iterable
Returns:
an instance of GibberishIterator

main

public static void main(String[] args)
Main method creates a Scanner using a given filename, uses it to create a GibberishWriter object, and calls GibberishWriter's next method a given number of times to produce gibberish.

Parameters:
args - The String array of command line arguments.
